speaker.whotheyare: MyVerse (real name Natalia Pitti) is a proud Boricua/Panamanian/Florida native who believes music should resonate with you.
speaker.whylisten: MyVerse is a recording artist, songwriter, poet, battle rapper and humanitarian best known for winning an MTV VMA for a song protesting the Dakota Access Pipeline. She was also the first Latina cast member on MTV's Wild 'N Out. She strongly believes that we don't need to be limited to one form of expression.
